Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 38th overall pick, by Washington in 2010...
Traded from Washington to Philadelphia on 2/4/2011 (Going to WSH: 3B J. Thurston, P T. Saunders, P B. Ford, 2B C. Santos. Going to PHI: SS J. Wilson, P I. Nova)...
Injured on 6/10/2011 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/3/2012 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 7/12/2012...
Had first career hit on 6/20/2013, off Johan Santana (LAN)...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2013...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2014, going 3-1, 1.16...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/6/2015 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 9 weeks...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2015...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/2018, off Jeremy Hellickson (NYN)...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Pitched NO-HITTER against San Francisco on 5/2/2020, striking out 8...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2020, going 4-0, 1.05...
Won Cy Young Award in 2020, going 23-8, 3.19 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/26/2021, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2021, going 6-1, 1.74...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2021, going 6-1, 2.15...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
